scripts.dev: npm run waitforit && waitforit --address=http://localstack:4566 --timeout=120 -retry 1000 -- npm run data && npm run server
scripts.connor: SET "NODE_ENV=local" && SET "DYNAMO_ENDPOINT=http://localstack:4566" && SET "AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=foo" && SET "AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=bar" && npm run dev
scripts.check-python: if [[ $(which pip3) ]]; then echo 'python installed'; else echo 'ERROR: please install python' && exit 1; fi
scripts.install-awslocal: if [[ $(which awslocal) ]]; then echo 'awslocal is installed'; else npm run check-python && pip3 install requests && pip3 install certifi && pip3 install awscli-local --user; fi
scripts.build-adapter: cd ../jd-catalog-to-edl-catalog-adapter && npm run build && cd ../governance-UI && cp ../jd-catalog-to-edl-catalog-adapter/local/lambda.zip local/governance-UI/data/lambda.zip && cp ../jd-catalog-to-edl-catalog-adapter/local/assume-role.json ./local/governance-UI/data/assume-role.json && cp ../jd-catalog-to-edl-catalog-adapter/local/dlq-attributes.json ./local/governance-UI/data/dlq-attributes.json && cp ../jd-catalog-to-edl-catalog-adapter/local/create-stack.sh local/governance-UI/startup/98-create-adapter-stack.sh && sed -i '' 's/local\//\/docker-entrypoint-initaws.d\//g' ./local/governance-UI/startup/98-create-adapter-stack.sh
scripts.kill-local: if [[ $(docker ps -aq --filter name=localstack) ]]; then docker rm -f $(docker ps -aq --filter name=localstack); else echo 'localstack not running'; fi && docker-compose down
scripts.check-env: if [[ $(echo $OKTA_SECRET) && $(echo $EDL_OKTA_SECRET) ]]; then echo 'environment variables defined'; else echo 'ERROR: Please set environment variables: OKTA_SECRET and EDL_OKTA_SECRET' && exit 1; fi
scripts.local: npm run check-env && npm run install-awslocal && docker-compose up
scripts.local-load: npm run kill-local && LOAD_LOCAL_DATA=true npm run local
scripts.localstack: npm run build-adapter && npm run local-load
